estroy the Foundry.

Quest Complete Descriptions

The Steel Watch Foundry was destroyed. Every Steel Watcher in the city has now been disabled. We dealt with Gortash without disabling the Steel Watch.

Disable the Steel Watch Walkthrough

Disable the Steel Watch is a subquest to Get Gortash's Netherstone.

Youcan enter the the Steel Watch Foundry (X:-236 Y:-180) by open the front gates. Head inside and reach the main door (X:-292 Y:-172) you will need to pass the Sleight of Hand Dexterity Skill
